data.name: Delete_MasterData
data.value: DELETE FROM cbv.attribute_field WHERE masterdata_type = @type AND masterdata_id = @id; DELETE FROM cbv.hierarchy WHERE type = @type AND (parent_id = @id OR children_id = @id); DELETE FROM cbv.attribute WHERE masterdata_id = @id AND masterdata_type = @type; DELETE FROM cbv.masterdata WHERE id = @id AND type = @type;

data.name: Read_Events
Read_Masterdata
data.value: SELECT md.type, md.id FROM cbv.masterdata md /**where**/ ORDER BY md.last_update DESC LIMIT @limit

data.name: Read_MasterdataAllAttributes
data.value: SELECT masterdata_type AS parent_type, masterdata_id AS parent_id, id, value FROM cbv.attribute WHERE masterdata_id = ANY(@ids)

data.name: Read_MasterdataAttributes
data.value: SELECT masterdata_type AS parent_type, masterdata_id AS parent_id, id, value FROM cbv.attribute WHERE masterdata_id = ANY(@ids) AND id = ANY(@attributes)

data.name: Read_MasterdataChildren
data.value: SELECT type, parent_id, children_id FROM cbv.hierarchy WHERE parent_id = ANY(@Ids);

data.name: Read_UserByUsername
data.value: SELECT id, username, password FROM users.user WHERE username = @username

data.name: Store_ContactInformationDto
data.value: INSERT INTO sbdh.contactinformation(id, header_id, type, identifier, contact, email, fax_number, phone_number, type_identifier) VALUES(@id, @headerid, @type, @identifier, @contact, @emailaddress, @faxnumber, @telephonenumber, @contacttypeidentifier) ...;

data.name: Store_CorrectiveIdDto
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.error_declaration_eventid(request_id, event_id, corrective_eventid) VALUES(@requestid, @eventid, @id) ...;

data.name: Store_CustomFieldDto
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.custom_field(request_id, event_id, field_id, parent_id, namespace, name, type, text_value, numeric_value, date_value) VALUES (@requestid, @eventid, @id, @parentid, @namespace, @name, @type, @textvalue, @numericvalue, @datevalue) ...;

data.name: Store_EpcDto
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.epc(request_id, event_id, epc, type, is_quantity, quantity, unit_of_measure) VALUES (@requestid, @eventid, @id, @type, @isquantity, @quantity, @unitofmeasure) ...;

data.name: Store_EventDto
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.event(request_id, id, record_time, action, event_type, event_timezone_offset, business_location, business_step, disposition, read_point, transformation_id, event_id, errordeclaration_time, errordeclaration_reason) VALUES(@requestid, @id, @eventtime, @action, @type, @eventtimezoneoffset, @businesslocation, @businessstep, @disposition, @readpoint, @transformationid, @eventid, @ErrorDeclarationTime, @ErrorDeclarationReason) ...;

data.name: Store_MasterDataAttributeDto
data.value: INSERT INTO cbv.attribute(masterdata_id, masterdata_type, id, value) VALUES(@parentid, @parenttype, @id, @value) ...;

data.name: Store_MasterDataDto
data.value: INSERT INTO cbv.masterdata(id, type, created_on, last_update) VALUES(@id, @type, NOW(), NOW()) ...;

data.name: Store_MasterDataFieldDto
data.value: INSERT INTO cbv.attribute_field(internal_id, internal_parent_id, masterdata_id, masterdata_type, parent_id, name, namespace, value) VALUES(@id, @internalparentid, @masterdataid, @masterdatatype, @parentid, @name, @namespace, @value) ...;

data.name: Store_MasterDataHierarchyDto
data.value: INSERT INTO cbv.hierarchy(type, parent_id, children_id) VALUES(@type, @parentid, @childrenid) ...;

data.name: Store_ParameterDto
data.value: INSERT INTO subscriptions.parameter(id, subscription_id, name) VALUES(@id, @subscriptionid, @name) ...;

data.name: Store_ParameterValueDto
data.value: INSERT INTO subscriptions.parameter_value(parameter_id, subscription_id, value) VALUES(@parameterid, @subscriptionId, @value) ...;

data.name: Store_RequestDto
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.request(document_time, record_time, subscription_id, user_id) VALUES(@documenttime, @recordtime, @subscriptionid, @userid) RETURNING id;

data.name: Store_SourceDestDto
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.source_destination(request_id, event_id, type, source_dest_id, direction) VALUES (@requestid, @eventid, @type, @id, @direction) ...;

data.name: Store_StandardHeaderDto
data.value: INSERT INTO sbdh.standardheader(id, version, standard, type_version, identifier, type, creation_datetime) VALUES(@id, @version, @standard, @typeversion, @instanceidentifier, @type, @creationdatetime);

data.name: Store_SubscriptionCallbackDto
data.value: INSERT INTO callback.query_callback(request_id, subscription_id, callback_type) VALUES(@headerid, @subscriptionid, @callbacktype);

data.name: Store_SubscriptionDto
data.value: INSERT INTO subscriptions.subscription(subscription_id, trigger, initial_record_time, report_if_empty, destination, query_name, active, schedule_seconds, schedule_minutes, schedule_hours, schedule_month, schedule_day_of_month, schedule_day_of_week) VALUES(@subscriptionid, @trigger, @initialrecordtime, @reportifempty, @destination, @queryname, @active, @second, @minute, @hour, @month, @dayofmonth, @dayofweek) RETURNING id;

data.name: Store_TransactionDto
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.business_transaction(request_id, event_id, transaction_type, transaction_id) VALUES (@requestid, @eventid, @type, @id) ...;
